This is a testharness.js-based test.

  assert_true: expected true got false
[FAIL] Test metaKey of mouse boundary events (modifiers are changed before move): metaKey of mouseout should be true
  assert_true: expected true got false
[FAIL] Test metaKey of mouse boundary events (modifiers are changed after move): metaKey of mouseover should be true
  assert_true: expected true got false
[FAIL] Test metaKey of mouse boundary events (modifiers are changed after move): metaKey of mouseout should be true
  assert_true: expected true got false
